DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Events Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Wound Complication Delay On Protocol Therapy Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A Yes/No indicator that indicates if wound complication has delayed protocol therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Events Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Wound Complication Delay On Protocol Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the adverse events domain._A medical condition that develops at the site of an existing wound. Examples include swelling, draining, bleeding, formation of hematoma, infection, and necrosis.:Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later._Subject is receiving treatment based on protocol.
